title: GTA 6 Properties & Safehouses Confirmed So Far
meta_description: On this page, you find the ultimate guide to all GTA 6 Properties and Safehouses - your hub for every confirmed, purchasable, and unlockable property in Grand Theft Auto VI.

confirmed_properties.name: Leonida Keys Safehouse
confirmed_properties.unlock_condition: Likely the starting safehouse for Jason and Lucia
confirmed_properties.notes: Property belongs to Brian Heder and is used by Jason (later Jason and Lucia) according to the page narrative.
